u.seg: When someone is making his coffee at the market,

spanGrp.span: when he is making his coffee at the market

u.seg: since he is one of the Rabameek, someone comes to him

spanGrp.span: since he is one of the Rabameek, someone comes to him
from it give me!" he says.

u.seg: he gives him the second one.

spanGrp.span: He gives him the second one.

u.seg: When he gives him the third one, then,

spanGrp.span: When he gives him the third one, then,

u.seg: because he has had enough coffee, this one

spanGrp.span: because he has had enough coffee, this one
when he gives him the third cup,

u.seg: when he gives him the third cup,
he says: "Sip!, this is Mouna's coffee!"
He gathers all three cups and throws them into the mortar, and

spanGrp.span: he gathers all three cups and throws them into the mortar, and

u.seg: and he grinds his cups inside the mortar, they said.

spanGrp.span: and he grinds, they said, his cups, inside the mortar.

u.seg: "Next time, drink with Mouna!" he says, they said,

spanGrp.span: malja muːnaj geːb gʷʔaː ndi eːn /
"Next time, drink with Mouna!" he says, they said,

u.seg: if it is this coffee that you would drink!"

spanGrp.span: now if it is that you would drink!"

u.seg: Let it not be our destiny!

spanGrp.span: Let it not be our possessions, our offsprings!
